attributes.action: Ignore the petition to take a re-vote on the EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details: A petition has been started by those who dont agree with the OUT decision made by the british public on the 23/06/2017 stating only 70% of the british public made it to the poll's. This is a higher percentage than that of the last general election, if those who decided not to vote because they felt their choice would be won over by others should be ingnored due to their initial ignorance. The referendum was a once in a life time oppertunity and the British public have spoken.
attributes.background: A petition has been started by those who dont agree with the OUT decision made by the british public on the 23/06/2017 stating only 70% of the british public made it to the poll's. Those who cared enough had their say and had the majority of the vote. Listen to the UK!
